issue.title: Group notifications for suppliers and notified users
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Group notifications for suppliers and notified users.

If an order contains multiple products for the same supplier, he will receive multiple emails.

We should group products in the notification and send one mail. (Group by extraction responsible, and group by notified users)

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
